titleStmt.title: A testimony against periwigs and periwig making, and playing on instruments of musick among Christians or any other in the days of the gospel being several reasons against those things / by one who for good conscience sake hath denyed and forsaken them, John Mulliner.
titleStmt.author: Mulliner, John.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
